content:
Hey @T-libs! We have a meeting at 2021-03-24T21:00:00+01:00, in about 2.5 hours.

Preliminary agenda: https://hackmd.io/KoqjEvUUSji1UXcxw5zk3g (Automatically generated. Didn't have time yet to check for outdated items.)
@Mara Does the script that generates the agenda look for I-needs-decision on both issues and PRs? It looks like it only checks issues.
Nevermind, just realized that github's issues search can also search PRs, despite its name.
I am on vacation this week with a weird schedule and can't make this one
Confirming something, we're meeting in 55 minutes, not 5 minutes ago?
I added an agenda item for "finalize meeting time based on Doodle poll".

Josh Triplett said:

Confirming something, we're meeting in 55 minutes, not 5 minutes ago?

yes. same as last week ^^
